title: Machine Learning Modeling for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Catalyst Material Development

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Learners engage in real-time lectures and simple hands-on practice in a smartphone-based environment, emphasizing the connection between theoretical understanding and practical application examples

learning_goals: Build machine learning models that predict catalytic properties of oxygen reduction/evolution reactions
Analyze material performance using feature engineering techniques based on elemental properties
Explain the physical meaning of model predictions through SHAP value interpretation

resources: Open-Source Machine Learning Libraries (Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
